page.shortlink: api client api a5 panelnavigator getstate method

return.name: state
return.description: The complete display state of the panel navigator.

page.description: Get the current display state of the navigator and all its children. Can be used in conjunction with A5.PanelNavigator.setState to restore panels to a previously cached state.
page.example: // assume pObj is a pointer to a panel class var state = pObj.getState();
